channel.title: Why aren't my objects changing angles..?
channel.description:
Ok i'm using delta and when i try and change the angle of it so it will be horizontal not verticle it doesn't work My code is like [code](coord, coord, id, -4, 10)[/code] i'm messing around with the -4 trie 4 doesn't work how do i change it?
Also how do i make npcs have dialouge above them? I just started coding in delta today... kinda different.

item.title: Why aren't my objects changing angles..?
item.dc:creator: @Seerofdeath Seerofdeath
item.description:
@Seerofdeath wrote:

If I am correct (i think) odd numbers are north to south and even numbers are east to west.
try 1 or -1? soz if it doesnt work, ima noob coder, getting beter with the simpler stuff

Read full topic
item.source: Why aren't my objects changing angles..?
